html:
April 29 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - OLUSEGUN "SEGUN" OGUNSANYA, MANAGING DIRECTOR AND CEO NIGERIA IS TO SUCCEED RAGHUNATH "RAGHU" MANDAVA, AS MANAGING DIRECTOR AND CEO

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - RAGHU MANDAVA'S INFORMED BOARD OF HIS INTENTION TO RETIRE

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - OGUNSANYA WILL JOIN BOARD OF AIRTEL AFRICA PLC WITH EFFECT FROM 1 OCTOBER 2021.

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
